message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,000.
Alice,  $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $8,500. This is my best offer, let's see if we can make this work.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,500 is too low, I'm willing to be flexible to find a middle ground.  How about we meet halfway and settle at $11,250?

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $11,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product and I'm willing to pay $9,500. This represents a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it's a fair price considering we both want to come to an agreement.
